QuestData.Title: Fire Fighter
QuestData.Description:
Commander Eranog has betrayed us and left this beast in charge.
You have done so much for me already, but I can not handle that monster in my current state.
Please, do this one last thing for me and help ensure that South Hold Gate does not fall to these Primalists.
We must kill their leader!
Help me, $n.
QuestData.PortraitGiverText: Leader of the Primalists attacking South Hold Gate.
QuestData.RewardText: With their leader dead these Primalists should be easy for reinforcements from Valdrakken to clear out.
